name: Alston Park
description:
ABOUT THE HOME ENERGY RATING SCALE
The HERS (Home Energy Rating System) Index allows buyers to compare the relative energy efficiency of different homes. The HERS Index home energy rating is determined by an independent RESNET-certified home energy rater ("Rater"). The lower a home’s score, the more energy efficient it is in comparison to the HERS referenced home. For every one-point decrease in the HERS Index score, there is a corresponding one percent (1%) reduction in energy consumption as compared to a home with a HERS Index of 100. A home with a HERS score of 100 reflects a home built to 2006 IEEC Building Codes. See the bottom of this page for more information on HERS scores.

amenities.name: Home Designs
amenities.description: New construction townhomes for sale in Greenville SC – featuring a three-bedroom floor plan from one of the nation’s largest home builders, Pulte Homes

amenities.name: Low maintenance
amenities.description: Low maintenance living with lawncare included in HOA dues

amenities.name: Greenville was
amenities.description: Greenville was ranked #2 on U.S. News’ Best Places to Live in South Carolina and #43 Best Places to Live in the U.S. in 2022-2023

amenities.name: Convenient access
amenities.description: Convenient access to employment centers, highly rated schools, and nearby recreation centers, entertainment destinations, golf courses, and retail via major travel corridors like I-85, I-385 and Hwy 276

amenities.name: Within minutes
amenities.description: Within 15 minutes of the events, eateries, boutiques, breweries and parks of Downtown Greenville

amenities.name: Located just
amenities.description: Located just one mile from I-85, Alston Park residents can drive south to Clemson or north to Spartanburg

amenities.name: Home Designs
amenities.description: Home Depot, Lowes, Hobby Lobby, Best Buy, Cabela’s, Walmart, Costco, Marshalls, Target, Sam’s Club, Trader Joes, Whole Foods, Publix, Aldi, Lidl, Home Team BBQ, Double Stamp Brewery, Rocky’s Nashville Hot Chicken, Willy Taco, Chick-fil-a, Bohemian Bull, Farmhouse Tacos and more are all within one to three miles of the community

amenities.name: Located one
amenities.description: Located one mile away from Alston Park, Millennium Business Park is home to the Clemson University International Center for Automotive Research, and TD Bank Corporate Campus.

amenities.name: BMW employing
amenities.description: BMW – employing 11,000 staffers – is a little over 11 miles away from the community.

amenities.name: Other major
amenities.description: Other major employers in the area include Prisma Health, Greenville County Schools, Michelin NA, Bon Secours St Francis Health, Duke Energy, General Electric Gas Turbine, Michelin and Lockheed Martin

amenities.name: addition Conestee
amenities.description: In addition to Conestee Nature Preserve, The Mauldin Cultural Center, Mauldin Sports Center, Legacy Park, Sunset Park, Wenwood Soccer Complex, and the Conestee Park Baseball Complex are all within a 2.5-mile radius of Alston Park
